topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5595a552636872468a00160f#post_5595a552636872468a00160f
So I while back my Sister gave me this thing she got that a fan of MLP gave her at at the flea market.

Apparently some Brony Con thing is happening _in Florida_.

So this entire time We were excited and wanted to go because We've NEEEEEEVER gone to a con before like at all. 

Well last second the Cons coming up this month on the 10th and we fined out you have to pay for tickets right?

Want to know how much those fucking Tickets are?

[spoiler]35 each for one day, 60 bucks EACH FOR THE WHOLE FUCKING WEEKEND, WE CANT AFFORD THAT AT ALL![/spoiler]
